								[1646] row ''
									[1647] rowheader 'Date First Available'
									[1648] cell 'June 19, 2019'
					[1649] cell "Product Description 1 MaxUSee 20-60x60 HD Spotting Scope with Tripod, Carrying Bag and Universal Smartphone Adapter This spotting scope has a powerful zoom magnification range from 20X to 60X which can meet your different observation needs. Along with the Smartphone adapter, this spotting scope not only provides you a wide HD optics zoom vision but also brings the beautiful world close to you and displays it dynamically on your phone's screen. Especially perfect for target shooting, hunting, bird watching, wildlife watching, hiking, camping, scenery, moon viewing etc. 5 INSTRUCTION: Put the Spotting scope onto the platform of the tripod (1) and Screw it tightly. To make an approximate sighting of the instrument, adjust the lever (2) that allows the scope to rotate on its central axis. Turn the Zoom power down to 20X, rotate the Focus ring (3) until you have obtained the clearest image possible. Rotate the Zoom ring (4) in order to vary the magnification from 20X-60X. Increased magnification requires adjustment of the Focus ring. NOTES: Please turn out the movable eyepiece cup when you are without glasses, and turn in the movable eyepiece cup when you are with glasses. Always begin viewing at a low magnification and increase steadily until the best magnification, compatible with the observed subject and its environment is achieved. With an increased magnification there is a decrease in luminosity and a reduction of the magnified area. 6 HOW TO USE THE SMART PHONE ADAPTER This Spotting scope comes with a universal Smart Phone Adapter that can be compatible with Telescope, Binoculars, Monocular, Spotting Scope and Microscope. You can capture images and video through this spotting scope and it is very easy to use. Step 1: Mount the clamp to the eyepiece of your spotting scope. Step 2: Adjust the phone holder and fix your cell phone into the adapter, center your phone's camera over the eyepiece, and use the knobs to secure the adapter in place. Step 3: Adjust the focus ring of the spotting scope to ensure that you can see clear image on your phone, then zoom the camera to be full screen. NOTE: The image you see from the phone at the beginning is just a small circle size, you can zoom the phone camera to see the full screen image. Product Quick Look"
						[1654] separator '', orientation='horizontal'
						[1655] heading 'Product Description'
						[1662] image '1', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/sc/cbe35694-a3b5-4261-bf56-c4baa78a8bf2.__CR40,0,1190,357_PT0_SX600_V1___.jpg'

Along with the Smartphone adapter, this spotting scope not only provides you a wide HD optics zoom vision but also brings the beautiful world close to you and displays it dynamically on your phone's screen. Especially perfect for target shooting, hunting, bird watching, wildlife watching, hiking, camping, scenery, moon viewing etc."
						[1675] table ''
							[1676] rowgroup ''

										[1680] paragraph ''
											[1681] image '2', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/sc/9855c99b-90df-4b51-9998-b3e6447606bf.__CR0,0,1500,1500_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
									[1683] columnheader '3'
										[1685] paragraph ''
											[1686] image '3', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/sc/a61daf76-3214-430d-bd13-70ada2179267.__CR0,0,1500,1500_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
									[1688] columnheader '4'
										[1690] paragraph ''
											[1691] image '4', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/sc/b420cb3a-b42d-45dc-b973-83c4275aa148.__CR0,3,1717,1717_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
								[1693] row ''
									[1694] cell '* FEATURES: Fully multi-coated lens and high quality BAK4 prism increase light transmission, deliver bright, clear, high-contrast images even in low-light conditions. Variable 20X to 60X magnification and dynamic lens focusing system makes it easy to zoom in on target. 45 degree angled eyepiece provides more comfortable viewing. Durable Aluminum Framework and Rubber Armor. The eyepiece shield can be stretched out to protect the eyepiece. Comes with the universial phone adapter which enables you to take videos and images.'
										[1696] heading '* FEATURES:'
										[1697] paragraph ''
										[1698] list ''
											[1699] listitem ''
												ListMarker '•'
												StaticText 'Fully multi-coated lens and high quality BAK4 prism increase light transmission, deliver bright, clear, high-contrast images even in low-light conditions.'
											[1701] listitem ''
												ListMarker '•'
												StaticText 'Variable 20X to 60X magnification and dynamic lens focusing system makes it easy to zoom in on target.'
											[1703] listitem ''

						[1764] image '5', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/sc/a6e6a98a-d962-4912-86e8-2717a23cdaa7.__CR58,0,577,577_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
						[1767] heading 'INSTRUCTION:'
						[1768] paragraph ''
						[1769] list ''
							[1770] listitem ''
								ListMarker '0.'
								StaticText 'Put the Spotting scope onto the platform of the tripod (1) and Screw it tightly.'
							[1772] listitem ''
								ListMarker '0.'
								StaticText 'To make an approximate sighting of the instrument, adjust the lever (2) that allows the scope to rotate on its central axis.'
							[1774] listitem ''
								ListMarker '0.'
								StaticText 'Turn the Zoom power down to 20X, rotate the Focus ring (3) until you have obtained the clearest image possible.'
							[1776] listitem ''
								ListMarker '0.'
								StaticText 'Rotate the Zoom ring (4) in order to vary the magnification from 20X-60X. Increased magnification requires adjustment of the Focus ring.'
						[1778] paragraph ''
						[1779] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'NOTES:'
						[1781] paragraph ''
						[1782] list ''
							[1783] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Please turn out the movable eyepiece cup when you are without glasses, and turn in the movable eyepiece cup when you are with glasses.'
							[1785] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Always begin viewing at a low magnification and increase steadily until the best magnification, compatible with the observed subject and its environment is achieved.'
							[1787] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'With an increased magnification there is a decrease in luminosity and a reduction of the magnified area.'
						[1789] paragraph ''
						[1802] image '6', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/sc/c75f88d2-788c-485d-b217-81f61dcbc0bc.__CR0,0,1421,1421_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
						[1805] heading 'HOW TO USE THE SMART PHONE ADAPTER'
						[1806] paragraph ''
						[1807] list ''
							[1808] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'This Spotting scope comes with a universal Smart Phone Adapter that can be compatible with Telescope, Binoculars, Monocular, Spotting Scope and Microscope. You can capture images and video through this spotting scope and it is very easy to use.'
							[1810] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Step 1: Mount the clamp to the eyepiece of your spotting scope.'
							[1812] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText "Step 2: Adjust the phone holder and fix your cell phone into the adapter, center your phone's camera over the eyepiece, and use the knobs to secure the adapter in place."
							[1814] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Step 3: Adjust the focus ring of the spotting scope to ensure that you can see clear image on your phone, then zoom the camera to be full screen.'
							[1816] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'NOTE: The image you see from the phone at the beginning is just a small circle size, you can zoom the phone camera to see the full screen image.'
						[1818] paragraph ''
						[1827] heading 'Product Quick Look'
						[1830] list ''
							[1831] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Zoom Magnification 20X-60X - Powerful zoom magnification runs from 20x to 60x allows you to lock onto the target and zoom in for more details. 45 Degree angled eyepiece offers comfortable viewing. Wide Field of View brings nature closer to you.'
							[1833] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'FMC Optical Lens & BAK4 Prism - Fully multi-coated lens and high quality BAK4 prism increase light transmission, deliver bright, clear, high-contrast images even in low-light conditions.'
							[1835] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Compact, Lightweight & Durable - Compact and Lightweight Spotting Scope is ideal for adults and kids for travel, hiking and camping. Durable framework and high-quality rubber armor provide non-slip grip, shock-proof grip and durable external protection, which enables this spotting scope to withstand the toughest weather conditions.'
							[1837] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Stable Tripod & Carrying bag - The tripod provides you stable observation from any angles. The rugged, specially designed carrying bag holds the spotting scope and all accessories for easy traveling and storage.'
							[1839] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Universal Smartphone Adapter - Comes with a universal smartphone adapter that you can use cell phone for video camera and image capturing to explore the nature of the world easily through the phone screen.'

									[1855] cell 'Maxunite'
					[1856] cell 'From the manufacturer CO11216 CO11216 CO11216 logo Specs Item: CO11216 Glass: BK-7 Field of View (ft @ 1000yds): 91 @ 30x-45 @ 60x Close Focus: 7m Eye Relief: 18.1-15.2mm Exit Pupil: 3-1mm Weight: 30 oz Included: Protective Soft Case ; Tabletop Tripod ; Lens Cloth 20-60x60mm WP Colorado Spotting Scope by Barska The 20-60x60 Colorado WP Spotting Scope with Case / Tripod is a durable yet cost-effective waterproof spotting scope useful for terrain navigation, bird watching, and spotting at the range. The broad 20-60x magnification range is ideal for almost any long-range outdoor application from the wilderness to the target range. A 60mm objective, fully coated optics, and Porro prism transmit bright detail-rich images throughout the entire zoom range. 20-60x60 Magnification 60mm Objective Waterproof / Fogproof Construction Fully Coated Optics Straight-Body Eyepiece Viewing'

						[1925] heading '20-60x60mm WP Colorado Spotting Scope'
						[1926] heading 'by Barska'
						[1927] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'The 20-60x60 Colorado WP Spotting Scope with Case / Tripod is a durable yet cost-effective waterproof spotting scope useful for terrain navigation, bird watching, and spotting at the range. The broad 20-60x magnification range is ideal for almost any long-range outdoor application from the wilderness to the target range. A 60mm objective, fully coated optics, and Porro prism transmit bright detail-rich images throughout the entire zoom range.'
						[1931] list ''
							[1932] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText '20-60x60 Magnification'
							[1935] listitem ''

								StaticText 'Fully Coated Optics'
							[1944] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Straight-Body Eyepiece Viewing'
						[1960] image '1', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/vc/b84f82c3-a0c8-456c-9170-b1422a10630a.__CR0,0,700,700_PT0_SX135_V1___.jpeg'
						[1962] heading 'Wide Magnification Range'
						[1965] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Boasting a powerful 20-60x zoom range, the Colorado spotter is well-suited for a wide range of viewing scenarios. At 20x, the spotter can be used for general observation. See something interesting? Quickly and easily zoom to 60x magnification to get a more detailed look.'
						[1968] image '2', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/vc/5dc67738-f4e2-4e3e-a838-73079cb10502.__CR0,0,1800,1800_PT0_SX135_V1___.jpg'
						[1970] heading 'Durable Construction'
						[1973] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'The scope comes with tough rubber armor exterior, BK-7 prism, and fully-coated lens, capable to stand up against challenges.'
						[1977] image '3', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/vc/b49a6a54-07d3-4845-9f33-1d9ed9f64e2f.__CR0,0,700,700_PT0_SX135_V1___.jpeg'
						[1979] heading 'Steady Viewing'
						[1982] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'An included tabletop ensures steady viewing in any situation. The integrated tripod mount will fit most standard tripod mounting screws, allowing the spotter to be used with both the included tripod or your own!'
						[1985] image '4', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/vc/79532242-3d78-4f76-b5f4-dc755c579662.__CR0,0,700,700_PT0_SX135_V1___.jpeg'
						[1987] heading 'Transport and Storage'
						[1990] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Keep your Colorado spotter protected on the go or while stored with the included soft case. This convenient soft case can easily store the included accessories, such as the tabletop tripod, lens cloth, and more.'

						[2101] heading 'Product Quick Look'
						[2104] list ''
							[2105] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'The 20-60x60 Colorado WP Spotting Scope with Case / Tripod is a durable yet cost-effective waterproof spotting scope useful for terrain navigation, bird watching, and spotting at the range. The broad 20-60x magnification range is ideal for almost any long-range outdoor application from the wilderness to the target range. A 60mm objective, fully coated optics, and Porro prism transmit bright detail-rich images throughout the entire zoom range.'
							[2107] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Precision Optics: The spotter features powerful and versatile 20-60x magnification that allows easy targeting and then zoom in for a closer and detailed look.'
							[2109] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Quality Optics: The spotting scope comes with BK-7 prism, fully-coated optics, and 60mm objective lenses, bringing you bright and crystal clear views.'
							[2111] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Solid Construction: The spotting scope is waterproof, fogproof, shockproof, and has a straight body design for convenient using.'
							[2113] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Tabletop Tripod: The integrated tripod mount fits standard tripod mounting screws, and the included tripod ensures steady viewing in any situation.'
							[2115] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText 'Compact & Portable: The compact spotter comes with a carrying soft case for convenience storage and transport.'
							[2117] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText '100-Percent Waterproof and fogproof'
							[2119] listitem ''
								ListMarker '•'
								StaticText '60mm large objective lens, 20x-60x adjustable ZOOM magnification with quick access focus ,'
								StaticText 'Great for targeting, hunting, astronomy, marine and general observation. Sets the standard for portability, optical performance and value'
								StaticText ','
								StaticText 'Includes pan-head tripod, carrying case and neckstrap. Limited Lifetime Warranty'

									[2176] cell 'October 9, 2008'
					[2177] cell "Product Description Nightfox Logo The Nightfox Vulpes Find Your Range Crystal Clear Footage Night Vision Innovation Dark night, clear vision Product Quick Look MORE POWERFUL THAN EVER: Nightfox's flagship unit is the Nightfox Vulpes, a pair of handheld night vision binoculars with a fixed 6x optical magnification and an adjustable 3x digital zoom. With a massive 220 yards of range in the darkness, the Vulpes is an ideal addition to your hunting gear or spy gear setup. Unlike a traditional night vision scope, The Vulpes works both in daylight and at night. INTEGRATED LASER RANGEFINDER: Thanks to an integrated Laser Rangefinder showing a real-time distance measurement on the screen, the Vulpes is the ultimate piece of tactical gear. Determine the exact distance of your target - up to 200 yards in optimal conditions - with a click of the button. The live measurement not only displays on the LCD screen but also shows on your captured video recordings. This unique feature makes the Vulpes the ideal pair of binoculars for hunting. CRYSTAL CLEAR FOOTAGE: The Vulpes boasts a Full High Definition (FHD) infrared camera sensor: 1920*1080p resolution. The night vision camera technology found inside the Vulpes means you'll get excellent quality video footage, all saved onto the included 32GB memory card and easily downloadable to your Mac or PC. AUDIO RECORDING: Thanks to an integrated microphone, video footage taken by the Vulpes also includes audio recording - A real innovation for digital night vision goggles like the Vulpes. Capture your complete night vision experience like never before. ENERGY ALL NIGHT: Two integrated rechargeable batteries totalling 6400mAh capacity give over 6 hours of constant use. With the included micro USB cable, simply plug the Vulpes into any USB port to charge, like a wall socket or a USB power bank. Never be stranded with a flat night vision scope again. If you need a pair of hunting binoculars to keep going all night, the Vulpes won't let you down."
